name: Epic Ninja
description:
Epic Ninja

Bad Dudes have taken over the Town, Use Your Stealth and Combat Skills to take out the Bad Dudes and Save the Town.

Use Your Sword or Shuriken in Battle.

Sneak Up from behind Enemies for a Stealth Kill.

Use the Enemy Distance Gauge to Locate Bad Dudes.

Try 'Locking On' to Enemies during a Fight for more Accuracy.

Collect Red Apples and Use them to Heal.

Use Your Grappling Hook to get to High Places.

Use Throwing Stones to Distract Enemies.

You can Swim, Climb Ledges, and Wall Hide.

Battle Enemies across Several Exciting Levels !
